definition: everything in disorder (idiom); in a hideous mess/at sixes and sevens
in confusion or disorder/in a confused state of mind/disorder/upheaval/riot/illicit sexual relations/to throw into disorder/to mix up/indiscriminate/random/arbitrary

sentences.english: Usually, galaxies this topsy-turvy result from a recent collision with a neighboring galaxy.
sentences.chinese: 通常星系这种乱七八糟是最近与邻近星系碰撞的结果。

sentences.english: Their role extends far beyond rough-and-tumble play, experts say.
sentences.chinese: 他们的角色远远不局限于乱七八糟的玩耍，专家说。

sentences.english: He keeps forgetting the words and the song is a sprawling mess.
sentences.chinese: 他老是忘词，歌被唱得乱七八糟。

sentences.english: She tell him to clear up the mess he have make.
sentences.chinese: 她要他清理好他弄得乱七八糟的东西。

sentences.english: The walls have been horribly vandalized with spray paint.
sentences.chinese: 墙上被人用喷漆涂得乱七八糟。

sentences.english: Why do you litter up the desk with these newspaper.
sentences.chinese: 你为什么老是把这些报纸乱七八糟地丢桌子上呢？

sentences.english: Everything is at sixes and sevens in the house.
She was scolded for the disorderliness of her room.
sentences.chinese: 她因为她的房间乱七八糟而挨骂。

sentences.english: There's a regular shindy in the house: and everything at sixes and sevens.
sentences.chinese: 屋里乱极了，一切都是乱七八糟的。

sentences.english: The house was at sixes and sevens when the parents were away.
sentences.chinese: 家长不在时，家里就变成乱七八糟。

sentences.english: Chewed-up pieces of leather and shoelaces lay scattered all over the carpet.
sentences.chinese: 被咬得乱七八糟的碎皮革和鞋带在地毯上散了一地。

sentences.english: Everything seemed at sixes and sevens.
sentences.chinese: 一切似乎都是乱七八糟。

sentences.english: The baby raveled the reel of thread up.
sentences.chinese: 婴儿将那团线弄得乱七八糟。

sentences.english: I feel I elephant a thin pancake drive a hideous mess of crumple indiscriminately.
sentences.chinese: 我感觉自己就象一张薄饼被乱七八糟的乱揉着。

sentences.english: The men of bivouac made the clean forest land into great confusion.
sentences.chinese: 野营者们把干净的林地搞得乱七八糟。

definition: an assortment/a bit of everything/lots of different (skills)
disordered and in a mess (idiom); all mixed up and chaotic
